mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, team_id, create_time, last_login, phone, disabled, password, gender, email) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, team_id, create_time, last_login, phone, disabled, password, gender, email from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, team_id, create_time, last_login, phone, disabled, password, gender, email from user
